label: Description
value: Bright red ground with a symmetrical design of a formal flower arrangement between an undulating pattern of flower and foliage in shades of brown and yellow.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: block printed on plain weave printed by engraved roller on plain weave

label: Description
value: Small piece of chintz with a blue ground in a pattern of flowers in a perpendicular arrangement. White Sweet William with fantastic leaves in shades of green, yellow and red against a curving band of red alternates with groups of garden flowers: iris, asters, tiger lilies with foliage in shades of red, blue, yellow, sepia and green (blue over yellow).

label: Physical description
value: Medium: glazed cotton Technique: relief printed

label: Description
value: Red and white in a stripe pattern with small foliage decoration crossed by a branching leaf and flower. A large leaf, pointed and with scalloped edge and interior decoration forms part of the pattern.

label: Description
value: Red and white in a stripe pattern with small foliage decoration crossed by a branching leaf and flower. A large leaf, pointed and with scalloped edge and interior decoration forms part of the pattern.

label: Description
value: Plate printed in red showing design of a man and woman dressed in eighteenth century garments. The man is seated in front of a house with a shoe, beside him is a box of tools. Woman is looking out of the entrance door. Scene is set within large scale garlands of birds, flowers and fruit.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave

label: Provenance
value: Pre-1960: Harold M. Bailey collection; 1960: acquired by the Museum.

label: Description
value: Off-white cotton, copperplate-printed in a red Chinoiserie design, in the style of Jean-Baptiste Pillement. A young man and a servant carrying a standard ascend a floating stair to a pavilion, amid fantastical foliage. The panel shows one full repeat, and parts of two others. The fabric is pieced at the top, quilted and interlined with wool.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave

label: Description
value: White ground resist printed in two shades of blue with a design of a large flowering vine between pillars.

label: Description
value: Off-white cotton, block printed in a floral design in red, blue, yellow, and green, outlined in dark brown. Ascending spirals of green-blue ribbon with curved clusters of small flowers form vertical columns; in the spaces a floral sprig with a large red flower alternates with a curving foliage pattern in violet and blue. The back-ground is filled with a picotage pattern in black. b) is cut from upper left corner of a).

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: block printed on plain weave

label: Dimensions
value: Warp x Weft: 82 x 100 cm (32 5/16 x 39 3/8 in.)

label: Description
value: Length of printed cotton with a naturalistic design with nasturtiums, passion flower, and other flowers, foliage, and vines crossing and intertwining. The design appears in white on a rich indigo blue ground with etched details in blue.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: discharge printed by engraved plate on indigo-dyed plain weave Label: indigo-dyed cotton, discharge printed by engraved plate

label: Provenance
value: Pre-1960: Harold M. Bailey collection; 1960: acquired by the Museum.

label: Description
value: Long, narrow fragment printed in a pillar design. Brilliant natural size flowers clustered on pillar, which is striped in deep red, brown, yellow, and light red. At side, small clusters of flowers. Ground in tea-color brown.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: roller and block printed, glazed

label: Description
value: Piece of thin glazed chintz, printed by combination of roller and block or roller and "surface roller". Yellow ground, pillar design in red with capitols in yellow, black and red; sides of pillars ornamented with flower sprays in yellow, red and black. In yellow field between flower clusters of natural size, roses, pansies and columbines, with butterfly, in shades of red, sepia and yellow.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: roller (mule) printed on plain weave

label: Description
value: Piece of thin glazed chintz, printed by combination of roller and block or roller and "surface roller". Yellow ground, pillar design in red with capitols in yellow, black and red; sides of pillars ornamented with flower sprays in yellow, red and black. In yellow field between flower clusters of natural size, roses, pansies and columbines, with butterfly, in shades of red, sepia and yellow.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: roller (mule) printed on plain weave

label: Description
value: Chintz fragments in a pillar design. Green-blue ground and pillar in shaded brown stripe effect with foliage and large flower clusters in shades of red, rose, yellow and green. Green color is produced by printing blue over yellow.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: relief printed and glazed

label: Description
value: Pillar print of two vertical fluted columns with baskets of flowers used as capitals. Appearing on the column, between the baskets, is a wreath enclosing an American eagle with a shield flag.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: roller and block printed, glazed

label: Description
value: Dark purple length densely patterned with large, brilliantly-colored flowers, foliage and ferns in shades of red, green, brown, and violet.

label: Notes
value: Dark purple length densely patterned with large, brilliantly-colored flowers, foliage and ferns in shades of red, green, brown, and violet.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: roller printed on plain weave

label: Description
value: Heavyweight fragment in a small allover design of leaf and bud clusters. Ground in red picotage. Leaf with a green center and leaves in red and dark brown. Buds are yellow rising from small mounds of red and blue.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen warp, cotton weft Technique: block printed on plain weave

label: Description
value: Two fragments with brown ground showing a striped pattern of curved columner design in dark brown, over printed in yellow, in a pattern of cornucopia and wheat.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed by engraved roller

label: Description
value: Polychrome panel with a vertical arrangement of flower bouquets of roses and passion flowers with foliage. Set off against vertical background stripes of small S-curves within foliage. Staggered repeat.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: engraved and relief roller printed on plain weave; red, brown and black printed by engraved roller; yellow and blue printed by a relief roller

label: Description
value: Thin, highly glazed chintz with a background of pale grey-blue showing large clusters of roses, other garden flowers and sprays of wheat in shades of rose, mauve, blue-green and pale yellow.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave; highly glazed printed by engraved roller on plain weave

label: Description
value: Panel of thin glazed chintz with ground in grey, with naturalistic flower clusters in lavender, rose and blue-green. Background has a streaked or cracked ice effect. Right side scalloped

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave Mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave

label: Description
value: Chintz with a brilliant blue ground showing a coarse chinoiserie design in red, yellow, blue, black, brown and green. Two groups of Chinese figures in staggered repeat.

value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave

label: Description
value: Shaped fragment, probably from a dress, showing a wavy stripe of rose and light brown, edged with yellow and blue stripes. Small flower clusters interrupt stripe.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave

label: Description
value: Printed fabric, quilted and lined, in the shape of a chair back. Spray of naturalistic flowers in reds and blues, foliage in brown. Background has a sprig design in light brown against a dark brown ground. Some of the blue color appears to be painted in.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: block printed, painted

label: Description
value: Loosely-woven gray ground with minute clusters of white dots in groups of three, and minute brown egg-shaped dots in groups of two. Block printed in small detached leaf pattern in green (blue with yellow) which is veined in brown. This leaf pattern about one inch long is in a diagonal and horizontal arrangement, but in random position.

label: Description
value: Panel of dark brown cotton printed in shades of red, brown, yellow, and green. Large floral bouquet set within garlands against floral stripes.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: roller and block printed

label: Description
value: Pale blue ground with a background of a small vine pattern reserved in white, possibly by discharge. Overprinted by block in a pattern of flower clusters in red, dark brown and dark green.

label: Dimensions
value: H x W: 41 x 28 cm (16 1/8 in. x 11 in.)

label: Description
value: Fragments of valance or bed skirt. Thin woven cotton with repeating floral pattern in blue on yellow. Dominant design feature is a large curled leaf containing cut flowers. Background printed with minute dots giving almost solid effect. Diagonally oriented design.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave

label: Provenance
value: Pre-1960: Harold M. Bailey collection; 1960: acquired by the Museum.

label: Description
value: Valance in a floral design consisting of a red ground with imbricated pattern in white. Large flowers clusters in white, red and dark brown with garlands of leaves in dark brown and red. With cords and tassels. Variety of picotage used in flower leaves. Leaf garlands printed with dark brown horizontal lines. Much detail outlined in black and dark brown. Faced with fragments of block printed cotton in tulip and leaf pattern in reds and dark brown.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: block printed, colored ground

label: Description
value: Large bouquet of roses with smaller climbing rose brances and other flowers. Background of dark brown and floral pattern in shades of red, green, blue and white.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: woodblock printed, glazed

label: Description
value: Fragment showing an incomplete repeat of a fruit basket and flowers. Background in light brown and pattern in shades of brown, yellow and green.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: printed and glazed

label: Description
value: Coarsely woven curtain panel in wide stripes of red and black. Broad vertical band of red with a large open flower and foliage reserved in white alternates with a broad ban printed in horizontal black lines and overprinted with red dots. Guard borders between wider bands of red with white pattern edged with black line.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: relief printed, colored ground

label: Description
value: Part of a small valance in coarse cotton printed in red with a pattern in white of a trellis of leaves with a rosette center.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: relief printed, colored ground

label: Description
value: Heavy cotton printed in red, yellow and black. Background is red with an allover net design in yellow. Leaves in yellow and black with a variety of picotage.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: relief printed, colored ground

label: Description
value: Heavy cotton printed in red, yellow and black. Background is red with an allover net design in yellow. Leaves in yellow and black with a variety of picotage.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: relief printed, colored ground

label: Description
value: Kerchief with a Chinoiserie border design printed in black on a red ground with yellow flowerheads. Mustard yellow central field with small areas and foliage patterns reserved in white. Design in horizontal-perpendicular repeat of four different groups of small Chinese figures in foliage or floral enframements in red, blue and green where printed over yellow and dark brown.

label: Description
value: Amphora-shaped body of solid spar supported on fluted pedestal on square base. Pedestal, top and mountings of gilt gold bronze. Top is an artichoke rising from a circular cluster of leaves. Two ram’s heads at shoulder, on either side.

label: Description
value: Jug with straight sides, narrowing at top and round at bottom. Open spout and scrolled handle. Relief molding at top and bottom. Apple green ground with polychrome painting of rose and pansies. Hinged, shell-shaped pewter cover.

label: Physical description
value: hard paste porcelain, vitreous enamel, gold; pewter

label: Provenance
value: Elizabeth Lynch Bishop; 1960: acquired by Museum

label: Description
value: Child's dress with drawstrings around neck and chest, made up of pieces of printed cotton with dark brown groun and large-scale flowers and leaves, in red and blue, with traces of yellow.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: block printed on plain weave
